name: Meating Demand
description:
Co-created by @icel and @jonobarel

Controls: 

W, A, S, D to move

Mouse to look

E or Left Mouse Button to interact

R - Reset game

Q - Quit

Independence Day is approaching. Demand will peak. You will have to slaughter the whole herd.  But first, why not get to know them?

Meating Demand is a short, emotional interactive experience developed under the Games for Social Innovation course at Shenkar College of Design and Engineering (Hebrew).

The game takes the player on a short journey to a cattle farm, in order to create a direct emotional connection with the process of raising cattle for meat and consumption.

Note: the game contains the slaughter of cows from a first person perspective. While not graphic or detailed, the symbolic act may be jarring to younger or more sensitive players.
developers: Baltam Studio - Aviv Icel and Jono Barel
